name: Ghost Guns
description: Ghost Guns is an intense, fast-pace and pretty hardcore shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Defeat the evilyet cute ghosts, survive countless waves of enemies and break your highscore. Will you be able to defeat the ghost army?

name: On Air
description: Imagine that you fell asleep in a quiet old hotel, and woke up in a completely different place, all the inhabitants of which want to kill you. Creatures hiding in the dark, strange shadows, heartbreaking screeching. You will have to face the unknown mechanisms and try to get out alive.

name: FromTheEarth VR
description: "A Journey to the space to find the heartwarming love between father and daughter" - An astronaut father spends his time with his lovely daughter, 'Hae-mi' before he embarks on journey to the universe. One day, he wakes up in the space and unexpectedly comes across aliens. But the truth is, whom aliens actually met is his soul.

name: Two Till Midnight
description: Two Till Midnight is a suspenseful horror rouge-like experience that will keep you tense and on edge each run. Steel yourself as the Mansion changes on you, a clever AI hunts you, and permadeath pressures you. Will you be able to survive the intense challenge?

name: Ten Days to War
description: You're the commander of a covert spy team placed behind enemy lines. The authorities are breathing down your neck while HQ demands you assassinate more terrorist targets, oh, and war is fast approaching. Can you hold it all together and survive?

name: My Only Sunshine
description: An otome game where you play as Sun with the chance to romance 9 possible love interests representing the planets in the Solar System (Yes, even Pluto). All the worlds really do revolve around you!

name: Rhythm Mage VR
description: The rhythm of the universe has been thrown off by a mysterious force. Portals are appearing all over the land, letting frustratingly cute creatures from other dimensions into our world. After many millennia of rest, you must aid Alfred and take up the mantel of Rhythm Mage to restore the rhythm of the universe.

name: NearPrime VR
description: NearPrime VR is a built-for-VR Cyberpunk FPS, incorporating elements of old and new FPS experiences with an unprecedented level of immersion to tell a riveting story of love, sacrifice, and what it means to be human. Jack into the eyes of near-future Heroes with superhuman abilities.

name: Moons of Ventocia
description: The lonely gnome-world Ventocia is threatened by the evil Eclipse, an otherworldly horror of religious proportions! Create and control your party of up to four little Ventocian Gnomelings from four unique and exciting character classes in this vast open world 3D Platformer / Action RPG.

name: Tower Defense: Defender of the Kingdom
description: Defender of the Kingdom: Tower Defense is a colorful medieval tower defense strategy game where orcs and their horde attacked the kingdom and now the fate of the kingdom is in your hands, defenders!

name: Once Upon A Time In Roswell
description: Once Upon a Time in Roswell is a first-person psychological horror that chronicles the story of a detective investigating the Peterson family's disappearance in 1947 in Roswell, New Mexico.

name: FBI: Paranormal Case
description: Aid a young FBI agent, newly promoted to the Department of Unclosed Case Files, as he uncovers an incredible international plot hiding a shocking and well-guarded secret! Search for clues and help the enquiry move forward, counter sabotage attempts, find evidence of the plot and bring to light the mysterious secret behind these paranormal events!

name: Have a Blast
description:
The matches are short and explosive.
The environment is dynamic and often hazardous.
The flying is tight and takes just a few rounds to master.
Slightly 3D.
Rendered clean and bright to fly on any screen size.

name: Volume Up
description: VR shoot'em up where the enemies come to you on the rhythm of the music.

name: Alien Jelly: Food For Thought!
description: Alien Jelly delivers on 50 levels of thoughtful puzzle design, mixed with weird and lovable characters packaged in a 50’s b-movie sci-fi environment.

name: SuperDriver
description: An arcade game in the style of retro games, fast, fun and incredibly challenging game.

name: Mage Math
description: Mage Math is a fantasy adventure game where kids fight monsters, use magic, and practice math. Your kids will have tons of fun in a full video game that helps kids become confident in math.

name: Forest of Elf
description: This is a stage clear action RPG game that fights with bows and arrows and powerful magic. Break through the WAVE set for each stage, and defeat the bosses who are waiting.

name: NYX: The Awakening
description: Imprisoned by NYX, Vicky must follow the trail of her lost memories in a disturbing town. The neon 80’s vibe highlights the setting and the drama as you explore the twisted world. Will you be stuck in the nightmare forever or will you escape?

name: Bob and Prickle
description: Experience the fast-paced platformer shooter mechanics with Bob and Prickle where you fight an evil company that wants to rule your city of Lightbul. Fire up your jetpack, choose a gun and fight back to save the city with your cactus assistant.

name: The Flower on Christmas Eve
description: This is a galgame independently produced by a small team in China. The CG, character figures, BGM and background graphics are made right according to the scenario to maximize player's immersion into the story.

name: Pokey Dokey Paradise
description:
Party game for 1-9 fingers (or friends). Play alone or share the keyboard with somebody else.

Try to control 9 paws (each of them assigned to a different key) to compete over a series of totally legit sports that we didn't just make up.

- Lots of crazy minigames you can play on your own or with up to 8 more friends.
- Short gameplay sessions.
- Super cute kittens!
- Different rulesets to rock your party.

name: Rush Wars
description:
Rush Wars is a fast-paced strategy game in which you will grow a squad of strangely connected and surprising new characters.
You will find a massive variety of troop combinations and enemy bases to defeat.
With its player vs. player design, you will need to plan and outsmart your opponents' bases to show them who’s boss!
Rush Wars is a game that everyone can enjoy but to master it, well... that’s the fun part!

name: Escape Game Cake
description: A popular escape game with lots of cute animals. Even if you are not good at solving puzzles, this is an escape game that you can enjoy casually.

name: Laufen Und Raufen
description: Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic multiplayer game for 2-8 players about penguins fighting over their fish. Steal the fish from the other penguins or work together as a team to gather the most fish so you could be the queens/kings of the Arctics!

name: AI Vendetta
description: Play as Proto the robot and use its power to transform to solve puzzles, manipulate the environment and blast your way through an exciting adventure in AI Vendetta.

name: Celestial
description: Celestial is a 2D indie platformer where you collect items against time.

name: Funny Road Chase Simulator
description: It's the biggest police chase in town. Run and don't get caught. Steal all the burgers in the city and buy all the vehicles in the store. Use the keys to control the characters.

name: Square Weapons Dungeon
description: Roguelike-ish Action Game/180 Weapons in total. The dungeon floors are chosen randomly from more than 100 stages. Collect the lost Weapons and challenge the Bosses. You will lose your Level and Weapons when you get defeated in the dungeon.

name: Stare : Block Breaker
description: Break Blocks!

name: Ultimate Flickball Arena
description: Charge up your power to flick your character through side winding mazes, combating enemies and solving puzzles to complete objectives, Later team up with your friends or go head to head in a Battle Arena mode to see who has the best navigation and combat skills.

name: Drive Me to the Moon
description: space date

name: Hunter x Hunter: Arena Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mithral Gun:Biomechanical
description: Mithral Gun: Biomechanical is a single-player game of action survival. It tells the story of a dispute between robots and humans at the end of the 24th century, in which players as BIOs of mechanical girls survived in the battlefield.

name: Spirit of Midnight
description: Spirit of Midnight is a charming adventure game. Play as a house cat who, after encountering a strange spirit, sets off on a mystery-solving adventure over the course of a single night. Meet other unusually intelligent (and adorable) forest creatures, some of whom join you on your quest for answers!

name: Vivid Spirit
description: Red, Yellow, Blue. It's Vivid! Her abilities are dictated by what color she is, and it's up to you to figure out how to use them and when to swap. Guide her and her dog, Spirit, on many adventures through the world of Paper Craft!

name: Monsters Ate My Metropolis
description: Sin descripción

name: Trucker's Dynasty - Cuba Libre
description: Start your own family and lead them into a secure future in Trucker's Dynasty: Cuba Libre.

name: LA Deadzone
description: LA Deadzone is an arcade exclusive Free Roam Experience. Players will physically walk through the environment to naturally progress through the story with no artificial locomotion. The Players experience an intense survival adventure fighting off zombies as they try to escape. Designed as a high throughput and impactful experience.

name: Corpoct
description: Test your wits as well as your ability to lead an expedition in this deep space dungeon-crawler. Hire the best heroes and villains of the galaxy. Find unknown planets in uncharted space. Start small, plan big and get a fleet of warships capable enough to rival most fearsome enemies.

name: Hexa Trains
description: Lay the tracks, schedule the trains, and let the planet's economy thrive. Are you the infrastructure-hero that has the chops to manage inter-global transport? Find out in... Hexa Trains!

name: Perfect Murder
description: You are a young student in a Japanese high school. You've murdered someone, and now you've got to cover it up. How will you manage to get out of this situation?

name: Lethe: Broken memories
description: Enter into the mind of Alan Zane, a loving husband and father, who is on the brink of losing his memories. Alzheimer's disease is trying to block your way, will you be able to remember your own life?

name: Yarbay
description: Yarbay is a psychological dramatic FPS game that tells the story of a warplane pilot. His plane shot down in the middle of the desert, in Middle East by terrorists and he has to take care of himself. Yarbay means "lieutenant colonel" in Turkish. And this "yarbay" Cihangir, must return to Turkey in one piece.

name: Hover Tank Arena
description: Dogfight style combat with Hover Tanks. Hover Tank Arena combat is a single-player game where you fight other Hover Tanks and Mechs to beat all of the competition!

name: Raiders of Chanyu
description: Choose your fate and embark on an odyssey as a garrison commander in ancient China. Maintain order, crush insurrection and protect the lands under your jurisdiction from the nomadic Chanyu clans of the Xiongnu.

name: Hello Kitty AR Kawaii World
description: Explore your very own neighborhood and meet your beloved Sanrio characters. Discover where Hello Kitty lives or where My Melody likes to hang out. Make friends with them, and other players, and use the power of friendship to build the Kawaii world together! Help them with challenges, grow and decorate your Kawaii world, and invite more friends and family along for the adventure.

name: Hunting in Ancient Asia
description: Highly free shooting game, just walk through the scene, hunting a variety of animals, when the hunting points reach a certain level, you will unlock the brilliant bow effect and arrow tail effect, enjoy hunting now!

name: Hyperspeed Fragfest
description: Hyperspeed Fragfest is a futuristic first person shooter featuring beautiful endless worlds and a unique ultra-fast player movement.

name: Sushi Wildlands
description: An open world RPG where you catch cute monsters for your farm and harvest the ingredients for your sushi shop!

name: The Legend of Tobimaru
description: A challenging old-school platforming adventure that sees you learning Nimpo skills and using them to fight your way through the most powerful ninja warriors.

name: Cult
description: Chosen to be sacrificed. A kidnapped girl must use her wits and strength to escape a cult of demon worshipers.

name: Gyatm
description: You are the first person on Mars. You will need to establish a base, mine resources, and build everything the colonists will need to survive. It's one person against a harsh and unforgiving planet where everything we take for granted is in short supply.

name: Railroads
description: Railroads is a procedural action game. It revolves around the memories of a nomad, who once ventured throughout an abandoned mine, full of unknown stories and horrifying monsters.

name: Crazy Cage
description: Flop & flail in competition of best fighter in the Crazy Cage. Ragdoll physics, melee weapons, guns with huge bullets & powerful explosives make for endless fun and chaos. Single player, 4 player split-screen & 8+ online for mind blowing mayhem.

name: Lady and Blade
description: This is a fast paced ARPG game. The heroine is a sexy and mature assassin, who can be replaced by a variety of clothing styles, with『Hack and Slash』that allows you to experience the pleasure of sweeping the battlefield.

name: Infinite Skyline: Superflight
description: Infinite Skyline: Superflight is a flying simulator focused on getting checkpoints and approximation points. Set in a huge city with 50 checkpoints and several secrets to be found.

name: Orchard Simulator
description: Orchard Simulator is a game in which our main job is to take care of the orchard. Take care of fruits, sell them and buy new seedlings and areas for new fruit trees.

name: Outstation
description: When you're a mercenary on the harvest mines, you're either on the edge of livin or in the middle of dyin. In a new frontier of space exploration, you have been hired to defend a mining operation on the edge of space from increasing waves of marauders. Upgrade your ship, fortify the station, and fight hard.

name: DungeonEpic
description: DungeonEpic is an old-school Roguelike with a few modern twists. Dungeon City is famed worldwide for its mystical dungeons, and hopeful adventurers come from throughout the land to test their skill and seek their fortune within. Seek out the secrets of the dungeons, and even learn to build your own!

name: Story in the Dream World
description: This game series is made up of many traditional stories from East Asia.

name: One Fantasy Shooter
description: One fantasy shooter is a first person shooter with big enemies and change gravity system for your hero. Explore the mysterious fantasy world, find secrets, open alternative versions of each level.

name: Nimian Legends: Vandgels
description: It is the eve of a grand debate on the spiritual future of Tiviscus and its people. A meeting of great minds and greater wills will decide the fate of a nation, and perhaps change the direction of Tiviscus itself

name: We Stay Behind
description: We Stay Behind is an interactive mystery short story about repressed trauma and buried secrets. As players guide the protagonist through an intriguing tale of personal discovery, their choices will literally transform Laura's world.

name: Out of Place
description:
Out of Place is the adventure of Simon, a teenager who suddenly finds himself in a destroyed world. Help reactivate an enormous, ancient machine which crashed into the mountainside. 
 
Change your skill-set on the fly and adapt your playstyle dynamically using your machine-like companion, the Orb. He not only provides you an immersive UI but also acts as a unique side character. 
 
Be brave and engage in action-packed combat and face your fears during atmospheric moments. 
 
Out of Place underlines how hard it is to overcome the fear of the future, but instead take action for a better world.

name: Wasteland Raiders
description: This game was cancelled in 2023.

name: Slice Back
description: Alien sushi? Yeah, there's live out there... and it's yummy! Follow a girl and her talking hamster in this hilarious side-scroller action game. Enjoy aerial combat, feed off aliens to get new powers, and eventually (spoiler alert) save the Earth. Grab your soy sauce and get ready for a taste of Slice Back!

name: Royal Area
description: Royal Area, an undercover first-person shooter. Bring your friends and join the battle, also you can fight bots alone in one of the modes: Free for All, Team Death Match and Capture the Flag .

name: The Shattered Blade
description: This Game is a pure action platformer,in this game you will control a very fast character,slash in endless danger, meet insane enemies and crazy traps.

name: The Lewd Knight
description: Help the girl - a superhero in the fight against evil

name: Divine Commander
description: Divine Commander is an Action-RTS designed specifically for the controller. Play as a powerful Greek god to dominate the battlefield. Build your base, command your army, and lead them to victory while you ravage the battlefield.

name: Mummy contact
description: Mummy contact is a side-view indirect control platformer that has to guide the mummy through safe paths while avoiding traps.

name: Percy Lancaster
description: This game, made in 3D with a side view, combines the atmosphere of old platform games with more modern graphics. The action takes place mainly underground at different levels. And in the final part the events are transferred to the surface of the planet and into space.

name: Ribbon
description: A casual game where you move in a limited space trying not to collide with own trail and fly out.

name: Misadventures of Laura Silver - Chapter II
description: Need MORE stress in your life? Your goal is to find the White Lady that terrorizes the surroundings of Bayeux, France. Meet the creepy townsfolk, and attempt to solve the occultic mystery. Includes family feud, incompetent officers, and poisonous blueberries. Also contains playable Coopers.

name: Marshin
description: Marshin is a dark and atmospheric puzzle platformer featuring striking yet minimalist visuals, immersive sound, and a haunting story that will chill you to your very core. Are you ready to step outside and into the darkness?

name: Ebullition LBVR
description: Ebullition LBVR is a high fidelity horror multiplayer shooter, designed for Virtual Reality Arcade and support co-location gameplay, that means players can start playing within seconds. This game is designed to be simple to play and without learning curve, so players can start having fun right away, even if they are not a gamer.

name: Scikor Final Scale
description: A lost astronaut must find the seven Crystals, which can solve the mysterious meteor it has found. To do this he must overcome challenges on unknown planets and use the powers of musical instruments.

name: Heal Plz
description: Play as the Healer! Heal, buff, and dispel your AI-controlled party members as you battle deadly enemies. Careful resource management and clever use of game mechanics is all that stands between you and a corpse run. A game for anyone that loves healing in MMORPGs, minus the MMO part.

name: Beastmaster and Princes
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Force
description:
A 5v5 FPS game in open beta for mobile devices in China.

Based on the trailers and beta gameplay It looks and seems to play like Overwatch but uses a cel-shaded anime art style, with a few copied maps and game designs.

It currently has 2 playable modes, Team Deathmatch and King of the Hill, with 2 more planned, Battle Royale and Bomb Defusal
There are 5 classes/roles with a total of 16 characters at the moment. Characters have 3 skills each.

name: Moonlight maze
description: will you survive the moonlight maze?

name: Yorg
description: Yorg (Yorg's an Open Racing Game) is a free open source racing game developed by Ya2 using Panda3D for Windows, OSX and Linux.

name: Dead Spawn
description: Dead Spawn is a fast-paced arena shoot ’em up, with building mechanics. Dead Spawn has rouge-like elements and is heavily inspired by Box Head Zombies.

name: No Country for Old Men
description: This is a game combines SIM and SRPG. Please lead your family, your friends and strangers who come to you to survive in this broken, unknown and fascinating universe, Captain.

name: Ru Guo Sheng Zhi You San Shi Sui
description: If you would die when you were thirty, What would you do? For almost all of us, we can only imagine. This game will take us to feel the experience of a virtual character, and to witness the rest of his life.

name: World of Tanks: Independence
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolfenstein: Youngblood - Digital Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tankman
description: Tankman is a top-view TDS arena shooter where the player acts as a fearless tankman.

name: Hobs
description: Hobs is a turn based card game which you can try different strategies to beat your opponent. Find best deck for your strategy, buy new heros, try different strategies and try to place to the top.

name: Janga
description: Are you tired? You want to relax? Come in Janga! Plant, grow, slide, build, fly, express your fantasy in a colorful paradise!

name: Adventure Cop 2
description: This time, the cop’s adventures threw him into a new thicket of criminal events

name: Bacchus
description: Make your Cocktail!

name: Revery Rebirth
description:
'Revery Rebirth' is the story of a musician just finishing their lessons on a remote island. However, once returning to the main land, things aren't as peaceful as they were before. 
 
A well trained musician in the land of Caarmellum is able to harness the elements of the world with song. You'll be able set fire with brass, change the ground beneath you with drums and several other possibilities. Combine these skills with other musicians you meet along the way and help bring peace back to the land.

name: Settlers of the Deep
description:
You start with a little settlement and must expand and conquer territory. The world in which you spawn is never the same. In order to survive you will have to defend yourself from the hostile wildlife and from other unfriendly civilizations. 
 
As you expand, you will have to be creative to manage all the aspect of your little industry.

name: Billy Meets World
description: In Billy Meets World, similar to the recent cult-favorite Flappy Bird, players will help Billy navigate the world of Lauv’s “Drugs & The Internet” music video.

name: Gravity Lane 981
description: Gravity Lane 981 is an original first-person puzzle game – our love letter to the Portal series. We‘re here to provide you not only with a fresh game mechanic that lets you manipulate gravity but also a thrilling, funny and heart-warming story.

name: Welcome to the Dark Place
description: An exploration through a cryptic and dangerous world where everything and nothing has a meaning. We all go to the Dark Place.

name: Screen VR
description: Realistic Satisfying Carnage

name: Locked & Loaded
description: Locked & Loaded is an advanced gun simulation game but also has realistic sandbox environments to play in, like fighting off a zombie horde or clearing an old abandoned building of terrorists who want to Nuke a nearby town.

name: Sitting around the world on a hot air balloon
description: Travel and to see the colorful world, such as: island castles, volcanic eruptions, city ruins, etc. When you raise your arms (more than 1 meter above the ground), the hot air balloon will move to follow your eye sights, and you can enjoy the view while exercising your arms too.

name: Dwarven Defender
description: Be tip of the spear to magisphere restoration efforts. Work is hard and risky but the pay is good and you get to smack goblins. Time to sail to Gledenor to be a violent spire farmer.

name: Holy Warrior
description: Holy Warrior is a classic platformer in the style of Super Mario. The main character of the game is a very greedy priest. He is attracted by everything that the hand of the giver brings, but this is not enough.

name: Evil Robots
description: Evil Robots is the classic defense of its base in the Rise of the Machine setting.

name: Kerfuffight
description: Have you ever had the urge to fight a friend? You can fulfill this urge in Kerfuffight by brawling in 3D with your friends or against Ai opponents across different biomes, each with their unique stages and weapons!

name: Crosser
description: How far can you cross? There's only one chance. Run!!

name: I Am Data
description: I Am Data is a fast paced, Neon soaked, First Person Shooter set in a Digital World.

name: Star Trek Online: Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamile VR
description: Set in 2084, Kamile VR will explore family aspirations to live a fulfilling life, while facing the reality of constant work and slavery for digital economics. At the time, the job market is already dominated by AI. To make a living people lend their brainpower for Neural Mining processes and further empower AI capabilities. You’ll assume the role of Kamile, wife of a genius scientist looking to develop a new generation of AI. When work-related tragic incident turns into family drama, Kamile is forced to fight and flight in order to protect her son and his secrets.

name: Closer to Me
description:
Closer To Me is a third-person game focused on solving puzzles in order to reveal the truth abouth the main character's past. Questions and more questions. The answers are increasingly scarce. What is up? Noone knows.
The story is told through an interactive, mysterious and heavy environment. Psychological pressure is an ever-present constant. Never lower your arms.
Keep your eyes wide open, listen very carefully and, most importantly, have your sanity in order. You never know what might happen.

name: Electric Sheep: A Cyberpunk Dystopia
description: In the near future, humanity has been minimalized, as the rise of android-rule crushes any threats to its near-term dominance. As part of the resistance, it’s your goal to undermine the automated dictatorship, and help free mankind from its robotic bonds.

name: Beat Guru
description: A one-button rhythm game for the soul.

name: Escape Architect VR
description: 'Escape Architect VR' is an exciting and challenging multi-room escape environment. Each room will have different themes, centered around the same style and lighthearted tone. Successful escapologists can use the room editor to create and share their own ingenious VR puzzles.

name: Heaven's Grave
description: Accompany a shrine maiden and three fallen deities on a journey across a dying world, where hope is all man has left.

name: Naked and Afraid: The Game
description: Enter the challenge for the true surivivors. Choose a contestant with unique traits, grab a survival tool and try to endure for 21 days on the deserted island of the Pacific Ocean. Hunt, cook and survive everchanging weather, tropical rains and unbearable heat. The longer you'll survive, the higher the reward.

name: Run Thief
description: Run Thief - In the game, you have to play the role of a thief who stole a plot against the Emperor. Passing traps and different locations in daylight or at night, leaving the chase the player will have an interesting adventure on behalf of a young thief saving his house from conspirators.

name: Nigel: The Minuscule Adventure
description: Welcome to the strange and miraculously existent world of Nigel: The Minuscule Adventure! Explore a not too vast and not very satisfying adventure as Nigel travels across 3 worlds in search of reversing a manifestation created by poor life choices and burnt eggs.

name: The Lost Strings
description: Sin descripción

name: GrandNarr
description: This is a fresh and action-packed sandbox game. Collect resources, make equipment, hone combat skills, occupy enemy bases, and master the map!

name: Veloren
description:
Veloren is an open-world multiplayer voxel RPG. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress and Minecraft.

Veloren is open-source. It is licensed under the GNU GPL 3.0 license. It uses original graphics, musics and other assets created by its volunteer community. Being contributor-driven, its development community and user community is one and the same: developers, players, artists and musicians come together to develop the game.

name: Total War: Elysium
description: Total War: Elysium is a Total War spinoff game. It's a card collection game where players take turns to battle each other with a deck of unit cards under the command of a historical leader, in a similar vein to how Hearthstone combat and gameplay works.

name: Mayor Moon
description:
Welcome to Mayor Moon. Let us celebrate the 50th landing on the moon. Let's play, what would happen if we stayed there? 
 
Play now and see your first settlers landing on the moon. Help them to grow to a city. Mine resources, process them to higher goods, research and unlock buildings. Take care of your colonists, feed them, let them do work and and explorer the secrets on the moon.

name: Destruction Darius 2
description: Destruction Darius 2 is the sequel to Destruction Darius.

name: The Treasures of Montezuma 4 Easter Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro/Grade + Soundtrack
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinth Life: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sigil
description: The main purpose of the “Sigil” is to tell a dark story about the search for the goal for which the protagonist is ready (a player must be ready) to make evil deeds, inexpressibly wicked and sometimes loathsome things.

name: Together: To Get Her
description: Discover a new world, but do not do it alone - take a friend, play together! Travel together through increasingly demanding levels of difficulty in many interesting biomes. Color the world decolourised by the evil Mona Chrome!

name: Humans 101
description: Humans 101 is a VR user-generated content creation game with an amusing narrative. Take part in absurd experiments created by misinformed aliens and create your own challenges using the Experiment Builder and compete with other players to top the charts!

name: Wind Runners
description: For centuries, the Realm uses fear and its military superiority to keep the Zarah Igna System under control, but a group of rebellious Ishma arises to fight its tyranny. With their superior aerial combat skills, the Wind Runners will bring freedom to all who live under the shadow of oppression!

name: Fringe Planet
description: Fringe Planet is a voxel based survival simulator game inspired by Dwarf Fortress and Rimworld. Set in a fantastic universe of eldritch horror inspired by the works of H. P. Lovecraft.

name: Mazgeon
description: Mazgeon is a catchy horror dungeon roguelike RPG with procedurally generated levels. Every 100 years, Scythe, The Grim Reaper, returns from hell to play his games with the cursed town of Mazgeon.

name: For a Better Country
description: This game is a text-based simulation for a pure country management experience. Old-school mechanics are combined with up-to-date topics and clean graphics.

name: Unreal Drone Racing
description: Unreal Drone Racing is an arcade style racing game with drones... and lasers!

name: Star Trek: Discovery - Away Mission
description: Built in partnership with CBS Interactive, Star Trek: Discovery Away Mission fully immerses you in the world of Star Trek like never before. You and your friends will join the crew aboard the U.S.S. Discovery. In your role as Starfleet officers, you'll have the chance to stand on a transporter pad with your own two feet and get beamed to your Away Mission. Guiding you on your mission is Starfleet officer Sylvia Tilly (voiced by Mary Wiseman). As an Away Team, you will investigate a mysterious distress signal originating from an unexplored alien world. Using iconic Starfleet equipment like the phaser and tricorder, it is up to your crew to work together to solve the mystery and survive the perils along the way.

name: Pass the Punch
description:
Pass The Punch follows the story of Rush, a resident of New Atlas, as she fights the dastardly villains King Crab and Red Velvet, who are hell-bent turning Rush’s favourite hangouts into lifeless, corporate franchises. It’s up to Rush and her three friends to claim back their city for the people!

The residents of New Atlas can transform into powerful beings with abilities based on their everyday lives. Rush is a gym owner who transforms into a lightspeed boxing champion and her buddy Claud is a LARPer whose foam sword grants the ability to turn into a badass berserker. Players can choose to fight as Rush, Claud, Beetle or Wizard to battle hyper-aggressive hot sauce bottles, disco-dancing mirror balls and over-affectionate ice-cream cones to name but a few of King Crab and Red Velvet’s minions.

Learn the moves and combos of each fighter, play solo with an AI sidekick, or in two-player local co-op. Find depth in the unique ways each character’s attacks compliment the others and “pass the punch” to create a unique ultimate attack, which changes based on which characters combine their powers. With so many punches to pass, high scores to hit, hoops to shoot, secrets to discover and extra content to unlock, Pass The Punch will keep players busy until they are TKO’d.

name: Watch Tower
description: Casual arcade with clicker elements! Defend the Kingdom from invasion! Take control of the last surviving tower and a group of archers to stop the army of evil creatures.

name: The Lost

description:
"Columnae: A Past Under Construction" is a non-linear point & click adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic steampunk world and developed by Belgrade-based Moonburnt Studio.

Aside from the classic point & click adventure features, Columnae introduces the concept of retrocausality which along with non-linear nature of the gameplay allows the player to affect not only the future but also the past of the main character and the world surrounding him. The game is divided into eight chapters, but the order of playing them is not chronological. Depending on the actions the player chooses within each chapter of the game, yet-to-be-played chapters are placed in an appropriate "version" of the past or the future.

Looks cool? yeah!
Sounds complicate? It isn’t. It is something between Minecraft, Pokemon Go and Second Life with all the power of a open world MMORPG and the freedom of a sandbox game.
Craft full scale structures around the world, other people can visit them and help you building bigger castles if you want. Play with friends with all the included games blocks, explore and dig to discover cool stuffs!

All the things you build in the real world will remain forever in that place and under your control.

name: Adarna: Alamat ni Maria Blanca
description:
This game is the sequel to Adarna, which was released in the year 2015. 
 
In the original 17th century Ibong Adarna tale by Jose de la Cruz, the Princesses Maria Blanca, Juana and Leonora were merely the girlfriends of the protagonist Prince Juan. At the end of the corrido, Juan picks Maria Blanca as his preferred wife, while the other two women became the wives of Juan's brothers, Pedro and Diego. All three women had interesting backgrounds, but the way they were treated in the story left something to be desired. This is a manuscript that is often discussed in Filipino literature classes, but the portrayal of women — either as damsels in distress or prizes to be chosen — are not empowering. 
 
Adarna: The Legend of Maria Blanca re-imagines what it would be like if these princesses' lives did not revolve around Juan or his brothers. Many regions of pre-Hispanic Philippines had matriarchal societies, and while the first Adarna game released by Senshi.Labs had a very Western feel to it, this sequel attempts to transport the players back to an indigeous pre-colonial atmosphere while keeping the language somewhat up to date. 
 
This adventure starts off in the Kingdom of Reinos de los Kristales, where the Princess Maria Blanca learns that her sister Isabela has fallen ill. A hermit approaches Maria to inform her that Isabela can only be cured by the mythical creature of Adarna. Maria then slips away from the kingdom and embarks on a quest to find the legendary bird.

Collect optional hidden gems by climbing, swinging and bouncing across an intricately hand-crafted island. Challenges lie temptingly around every corner, and then around the corner from that. Tackle the trials at your own pace and carve your own journey through the island.

The Trials are tough, but they reward courage and perseverance. When you fail you're quickly thrown straight back into the action with instant respawns, armed with one more attempt's worth of knowledge and practice.

description: This is a simple casual game where the player needs to control the harpoon that the fisherman avoids.

name: Ariadna's Bane
description: Ariadna's Bane is an action rpg / roguelike hybrid sets in dark Sci-Fi environment.

name: Open Ocean
description: Discover what it's like to live the life of a shark in today's open ocean. A small game with a powerful message.

name: Balls Out
description: “Balls Out” is a 4 player co-op action games show shooter. Think Rocket League meets Smash TV. Players run from arena to arena collecting cash and prizes while battling hordes of hungry aliens who advance from all sides.
